name: TalkRoag
commands: I did wonder, how is it you came to be a knight?
Uhm... Well, I guess I was on the OTHER side of the law.
It's ok hun, I didn't do anything TOO bad...
Now I'm curious, what kind of things did you do?
That's a secret!|Anyway, things got worse, soooo I left the gang.
Not really, I'd always leave in search of better things.|Only to come back to 'em when things didn't work out...|Like, I guess this army's kept me fed, ya know?
Yah, thank you for worrying about me, Sagey.
source:
multi_add_portrait;Roag;Right;Sages;Left
speak;Roag;Hey, Sagey!|How's it goin' girlie?
speak;Sages;Roag, right?
speak;Roag;Yahuh. That's me.
speak;Sages;I did wonder, how is it you came to be a knight?
speak;Roag;Uhm... Well, I guess I was on the OTHER side of the law.
speak;Sages;I see...
speak;Roag;It's ok hun, I didn't do anything TOO bad...
speak;Sages;Now I'm curious, what kind of things did you do?
speak;Roag;That's a secret!|Anyway, things got worse, soooo I left the gang.
speak;Sages;Were you close?
speak;Roag;Not really, I'd always leave in search of better things.|Only to come back to 'em when things didn't work out...|Like, I guess this army's kept me fed, ya know? 
speak;Sages;At least you're doing better...
speak;Roag;Yah, thank you for worrying about me, Sagey.
speak;Sages;Anytime.
multi_remove_portrait;Roag;Sages
remove_talk;Sages;Roag
